meanings.definition: Used by or belonging to us
meanings.sent1: We made the decision by ourself.
meanings.sent3: Ourself is the best choice for this task.
meanings.sent4: In a group, ourself stands out.
meanings.sent5: We must rely on ourself to succeed.

meanings.definition: Used reflexively as the direct or indirect object of a verb or as the object of a preposition
meanings.sent2: We should take care of ourself.
meanings.sent3: Ourself accidentally bumped into the door.
meanings.sent5: We must believe in ourself to achieve our goals.

meanings.definition: Used as an emphatic form of 'our'
meanings.sent1: Ourself, we will handle this situation.
meanings.sent3: Ourself is quite capable of solving this puzzle.
meanings.sent4: In times of need, ourself is all we have.
meanings.sent5: We must always stand up for ourself.
